column4: how can i make more room in my ubuntu partition?  im trying to move a file from a removable hard drive into wine, but it says i dont have any room on the disk

did you try changing the resolution
you want to resize the ntfs partition?
you want to erase that ntfs partition (delete) or resize it
you have to be very careful with gparted.
you might consider getting the gparted livecd; not backing up is seriously risky though.
gparted is for resizing, deleting or creating new partitions
